name: Hungry Frog (itch) (pmurph0305)
description:
Control the frog's tongue and try to catch flies to feed yourself. Keep yourself fed for as long as possible!

I went with a stretchy frog tongue because it was the first thing I thought of that would be fun to do for my first game jam.

I wanted to incorporate a time limit in a way that an actual timer isn't shown. So I decided to use a hunger meter as a timer, where time can be extended by eating flies.

Controls:

  • Space: Shoot / Retract Tongue
  • WASD: Move Tongue

Everything except the audio was created completely by me, from scratch, for the  Mini Jam 106: Frogs.

Music: Saturated Drops by Shane Ivers - https://www.silvermansound.com
